ch.uzh.ifi.MechanismDesignPrimitives

Class JointProbabilityMass

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.uzh.ifi.MechanismDesignPrimitives.JointProbabilityMass

  • public class JointProbabilityMass
extends java.lang.Object
    The class implements functionality for modeling joint probability mass functions using the "bombing" approach.
    Author:
    Dmitry Moor

        public void setSample(int sIdx,
                      double[] sample)

      • generateSamples

        private void generateSamples()
        The method generates samples from the joint pmf using "bombing" algorithm (described in comments). A sample is a state of every node in the graph after the specified number of bombs was thrown.

      • throwDeterministicBomb

        private double[] throwDeterministicBomb(double[] sample)
        The method throws a "bomb" into the grid
        Parameters:
        sample - - a sample to be bombed
        Returns:
        the sample after being bombed
